Trade/Device Name(s): BD Vacutainer UltraTouch Push Button Blood Collection Set
BD Vacutainer® UltraTouch™ Push Button Blood Collection Set
Regulation Name(s): Blood Collection Set, IV Administration Set
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Vacutainer UltraTouch Push Button Blood Collection Set for venipuncture specimen collection, including patients with difficult vein access
Indications for Use Summary: Sterile, multi-sample, single-use winged blood collection set for trained healthcare professionals to obtain blood specimens via venipuncture, including patients with difficult vein access, into evacuated tubes or blood culture bottles; may also be used for short-term single infusions and specimen collection via syringe when male adapter is not used.
